sql-statements.statement: SELECT to_char(e.start_time - :1, 'hh24:mi') as time, patient.person_id as patient_id, patient.short_sortable_name as patient, initcap(e.subject) as reason, at.caption as appt_type, astat.caption as status, patient.person_id FROM Appt_Status astat, Person patient, Person provider, Event_Attribute ea, Appt_Type at, Event e WHERE e.start_time >= to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 AND e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 + 1 AND e.discard_type is null AND at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type AND ea.parent_id = e.event_id AND ea.value_type = 333 AND ea.value_text = patient.person_id AND ea.value_textB = provider.person_id AND ( ea.value_textB = :3 or ea.value_textB in (select value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = :3 and item_name = 'WorkList' and value_type = 250 and parent_org_id = :4 ) ) AND astat.id = e.event_status ORDER BY e.start_time

SELECT to_char(e.start_time - :1, 'hh24:mi') as time, patient.person_id as patient_id, patient.short_sortable_name as patient, initcap(e.subject) as reason, at.caption as appt_type, astat.caption as status, patient.person_id FROM Appt_Status astat, Person patient, Person provider, Event_Attribute ea, Appt_Type at, Event e WHERE e.start_time >= to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 AND e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 + 1 AND e.discard_type is null AND e.event_status = 2 AND at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type AND ea.parent_id = e.event_id AND ea.value_type = 333 AND ea.value_text = patient.person_id AND ea.value_textB = provider.person_id AND ( ea.value_textB = :3 or ea.value_textB in (select value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = :3 and item_name = 'WorkList' and value_type = 250 and parent_org_id = :4 ) ) AND astat.id = e.event_status ORDER BY e.start_time

select o.name_primary as hospital_name, caption as room, initcap(simple_name) as patient_name, provider_id, trans_owner_id as patient_id, to_char(trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as begin_date, detail as diags, data_text_c as procs from Org o, Person, Transaction where trans_type between 11000 and 11999 and trans_status = 2 and trans_begin_stamp >= sysdate - data_num_a and (provider_id = :1 OR provider_id in ( select value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = :1 and value_type = 250 and item_name = 'WorkList' and parent_org_id = :2 ) ) and person.person_id = transaction.trans_owner_id and o.org_internal_id = transaction.service_facility_id

SELECT to_char(e.start_time - :1, 'hh24:mi') as time, patient.person_id as patient_id, patient.short_sortable_name as patient, initcap(e.subject) as reason, at.caption as appt_type, astat.caption as status, patient.person_id FROM Appt_Status astat, Person patient, Person provider, Event_Attribute ea, Appt_Type at, Event e WHERE e.start_time >= to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 AND e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 + 1 AND e.discard_type is null AND e.event_status = 1 AND at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type AND ea.parent_id = e.event_id AND ea.value_type = 333 AND ea.value_text = patient.person_id AND ea.value_textB = provider.person_id AND ( ea.value_textB = :3 or ea.value_textB in (select value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = :3 and item_name = 'WorkList' and value_type = 250 and parent_org_id = :4 ) ) AND astat.id = e.event_status ORDER BY e.start_time

SELECT permed_id, med_name, dose, dose_units, frequency, route, TO_CHAR(start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, TO_CHAR(end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as end_date, frequency, num_refills, approved_by FROM Person_Medication WHERE parent_id = upper(:1) and (end_date IS NULL OR end_date > TRUNC(sysdate)) ORDER BY start_date DESC, med_name

select to_char(t.curr_onset_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as curr_onset_date, to_char(t.trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as trans_date, initcap(ref.name) as name, t.provider_id, 'ICD ' || t.code as code from ref_icd ref, transaction t where t.trans_owner_id = upper(:1) and t.trans_owner_type = 0 and t.trans_type = 3020 and t.trans_status = 2 and ref.icd (+) = t.code order by trans_date desc, trans_id desc
select value_type, item_id, item_name, value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = upper(:1) and value_type in (410, 411, 412)
SELECT b.caption FROM Blood_Type b, Person_Attribute pa WHERE pa.parent_id = upper(:1) AND pa.item_name = 'BloodType' AND b.id = pa.value_text

select complete_sortable_name as name, complete_addr_html as address, home.value_text as home_phone, work.value_text as work_phone, to_char(date_of_birth, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as dob, decode(gender, 1, 'Male', 2, 'Female', 'Gender Unknown') as gender, trunc((sysdate - date_of_birth)/365) as age from person_attribute home, person_attribute work, person_address, person where person_id = upper(:1) and person_address.parent_id = person.person_id and work.parent_id (+) = person.person_id and work.item_name (+) = 'Work' and home.parent_id (+) = person.person_id and home.item_name (+) = 'Home'

SELECT product_name, plan_name, DECODE(bill_sequence,1,'Primary', 2,'Secondary', 3,'Tertiary', 4,'Quaternary', 5,'W. Comp', '') as bill_sequence, guarantor_name, ct.caption, o.org_id FROM claim_type ct, org o, insurance i WHERE record_type = 3 AND owner_person_id = upper(:1) AND o.org_internal_id (+)= i.ins_org_id AND ct.id = i.ins_type GROUP BY product_name, plan_name, bill_sequence, guarantor_name, ct.caption, o.org_id, guarantor_name ORDER BY bill_sequence

SELECT to_char(e.start_time - :1, 'hh24:mi') as time, patient.person_id as patient_id, patient.short_sortable_name as patient, initcap(e.subject) as reason, at.caption as appt_type, astat.caption as status, patient.person_id FROM Appt_Status astat, Person patient, Person provider, Event_Attribute ea, Appt_Type at, Event e WHERE e.start_time >= to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 AND e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :1 + 1 AND e.discard_type is null AND e.event_status = 0 AND at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type AND ea.parent_id = e.event_id AND ea.value_type = 333 AND ea.value_text = patient.person_id AND ea.value_textB = provider.person_id AND ( ea.value_textB = :3 or ea.value_textB in (select value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = :3 and item_name = 'WorkList' and value_type = 250 and parent_org_id = :4 ) ) AND astat.id = e.event_status ORDER BY e.start_time
